originalText.text: The food is TOP TIER delicious. The smoothies, juices, everything is FIRE. I had an issue with my blood pressure and came everyday for a shot of wheat grass. It helped! Delicious. Healthy! And itâ€™s black owned. You literally canâ€™t go wrong. SO glad to have this in the neighborhood.

originalText.text: This place is such a gem! Delicious, healthy, affordable, and the guys who work there are the nicest. Everything Iâ€™ve ever gotten is good - my go-toâ€™s are the green monster (juice) with pineapple instead of apple, and protein salad with spicy chicken. But you canâ€™t go wrong with the patties, wraps, plantains or anything else. Highly recommend you give this place a try.

originalText.text: I bought a mixed greens salad with grilled chicken (mild) and about 7 toppings and two waters. Think I paid about $13.50. Second time getting a salad from here and it's very good. If I lived in Harlem, I'm sure I would come here more often. They also have vegetarian options. Will recommend.

text.text: I bought a mixed greens salad with grilled chicken (mild) and about 7 toppings and two waters. Think I paid about $13.50. Second time getting a salad from here and it's very good. If I lived in Harlem, I'm sure I would come here more often. They also have vegetarian options. Will recommend.

originalText.text: Small harlem food shop. Multiple vegan/vegetarian options, but also has meat options, hot food (rice/quinoa base), salads, wraps, fruit smoothies. I had some kind of seasoned tofu with purple cabbage, chickpeas, and some vegetable stuff, on a brown rice base, which tasted excellent - delicious flavour/spices, and more than enough for one person. I got the small option for 9$, but the larger portion is 12 or 13$.  Not much space to sit as the store is quite small (maybe enough space for 5-6 people) but theres a park nearby, or central park a few blocks down. Only thing I didnt like was the "Hals" BBQ chips, they werent the best (almost felt like they had no seasoning) but its not like they make the chips, so just stock different ones I guess! Overall this was an excellent place, especially for vegan food, and I will definitely be back.
